name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Strict Focus | Site Blocker & Focus Mode

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enforces a 25min/5min workflow: 25 minutes of distraction-free work, followed by 5-minute break.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to distractions and harmful websites! With Strict Focus, you can block them during your focus sessions, keeping your productivity on track and your mind clear. Strict Focus time management strategy is powerful and quite simple: dive into focused work for 25 minutes, distraction-free, knowing that a refreshing 5-minute break is just around the corner. 

Key features:

✓ Focus timer
Easily customise your focus and break times, sound, and desktop notifications, to keep you focused and motivated.

✓ Site blocker
Block distracting websites and subdomains to keep your attention where it belongs.

✓ Whitelist option
Only want access to certain sites? Use the whitelist to block everything else.

✓ Effortless setup
Get started instantly with a list of predefined distracting websites, making setup quick and easy.

✓ Settings sync
Your settings follow you wherever you go when you sync with your Google account.

P.S. Are you a fan of Strict Workflow or Marinara: Pomodoro® Assistant? We are too! We truly appreciate these tools and are committed to carrying on their legacy while making enhancements to create an even better experience for our users.
